name: Amazing Meatless Sloppy Joes
author: Chicken_Livers_Stink
summary: A vegetarian alternative that will be sure to satisfy even a diehard carnivore. Serve these tofu Sloppy Joes on hamburger buns with or without cheese. Also a great vegetarian substitute for chili fries.
ingredients: 2 medium jalapeno peppers, seeded and chopped
1 (14.5 ounce) can whole tomatoes, drained and chopped
½ medium green bell pepper, chopped
½ medium yellow bell pepper, chopped
1 tablespoon chili powder, or to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Drain tofu and use your hands to squeeze out as much remaining liquid as possible
Heat oil in a medium pan over medium heat
Add onion, jalapenos, and garlic; saute for 2 minutes
Add crumbled tofu; saute until browned, 5 to 10 minutes
Add tomatoes, mushrooms, bell peppers, ketchup, mustard, Worcestershire sauce, vinegar, chili powder, salt, and pepper
Stir to combine and cook until heated through, 5 to 10 minutes
